mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_notification_rule WHERE status = '0' ORDER BY rule_type, create_time
SELECT * FROM sys_notification_rule WHERE rule_type = 'event' AND status = '0' AND JSON_EXTRACT(trigger_condition, '$.eventType') = #{eventType}

SELECT r.* FROM sys_notification_rule r WHERE r.status = '0' AND r.todo_type = '1' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role ur JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND rm.menu_id = r.menu_id) ORDER BY r.template_id, r.create_time DESC
